description: FX Ventures is a private investment company focused on venture capital and real estate related investments. FX Ventures' investment portfolio currently includes private companies in the healthcare, travel & leisure, technology and real estate industries.

Alstin Capital is an independent early-stage venture capital fund based in Munich. Its investment activities focus on fast-growing (B2B) technology companies in the DACH region and Europe, primarily in the Seed and Series A phase.

Since then, Vealo Ventures has invested in numerous successful technology startups, with the goal to bring together outstanding ideas, strong personalities, and capital to build successful companies.

description: Be8 Ventures is a Berlin-based growth stage Venture Capital Fund, and their core value is a strong commitment towards innovation throughout the entire food and beverage value chain (i.e., Innovative Food, E-Grocery, Retail & Gastro Tech, Packaging & Waste). The investment focus is space technology, sustainable aero, and robotics. Urania believes in science as acritical driver for innovation and the responsibility to invest in courageous leaders early.

name: LIOS Ventures

The fund and its managers, Pawel Chudzinski and Christoph Janz have backed a number of highly successful Internet companies such as Delivery Hero, Clio,Shiftplanning, Vend, Typeform, and Zendesk from their earliest stages.

Based on the entrepreneurial roots in the healthcare sector, Arve Capital is a dedicated long-term partner for passionate founders on their mission to ensure and promotehealthy lives.

Their portfolio companies are front and center at factories, delivering smart machinery and robotics for high-volume manufacturing. They connect founders with executives and investors, playing a crucial role in driving connectivity across the global supply chain.

Using their reliable network and strong ecosystem, they have direct access to the complete bandwidth of players in the whole healthcare system.

description: Heartbeat Labs is a healthcare company builder based in Berlin. They provide seed funding of €0.5 to €5 million, access to a unique network of investors and operational expertise in marketing, HR, finance,regulatory affairs and more. Their team has the experience of building more than 20 successful internet companies that have brought the advantages of digitization to industries such as financial services and advertising.

name: STARTPLATZ
description: STARTPLATZ is a startup accelerator & incubator for early-stage tech startups. STARTPLATZ is a startup incubator and accelerator with branches in Cologne and Düsseldorf and functions as a hub for the Rhineland ecosystem and the local founders' scene. We offer much more than just coworking: The biggest startup community in NRW including networking events, conference and meeting rooms in an innovative atmosphere, workshops on all kinds of topics, an accelerator program & much more.

investmentAreas: Internet, Network Security, Venture Capital, Financial Services, Investments

description: Antifragile can help your company become a digital company. Their ambition is to create meaningful, groundbreaking collaborations between their startups and established companies.

description: Styx Urban Investments distinguishes itself as a startup investor with a unique proposition: the Styx Living Lab, a proprietary testing environment specifically tailored for early stage startups in the proptech and urban communities sectors. Beyond traditional financial backing, Styx provides startups with full access to their Living Lab, facilitating early validation of innovative ideas within these fields. Moreover, Styx leverages its extensive industry experience embedded within its investor network to offer co-development opportunities and access to a robust sales pipeline. This approach allows Styx to invest confidently at extremely early stages, supporting startups from ideation through to market validation and beyond.

name: allygatr
description: allygatr builds and invests in HR Tech companies and helps them thrive. Their mission is to transform HR & recruitment and lead it into the 21st century. Together with their allies, they aim to cover the whole HR value chain.

description: Their growing team is motivated to invest in exceptional, mission-driven founders who lead technology-enabled businesses. description: As single family office, Sanner Ventures aims to explore new business areas and to invest in early-stage technology companies in the area of health and well-being. Sanner Ventures is devoted to products and solutions that help protect patient health and facilitate consumer engagement.

description: The BITO CAMPUS was founded in 2017 as a start-up center for technology-based startups. Their goal is to sustainably secure and expand the success of their parent company through innovation. To achieve this, they identify and validate new business ideas and help build new business areas from scratch.

name: AENU
description: AENU drives systemic transformation in venture capital towards impact, accessibility, and stakeholder alignment. They are an impact technology fund aligned with Article 9 SFDR, focusing on early-stage climate tech companies based in Europe.

name: HTGF | High-Tech Gruenderfonds
description:
HTGF is one of the leading and most active early-stage investors in Germany and Europe, financing startups in the fields of Deep Tech, Industrial Tech, Climate Tech, Digital Tech, Life Sciences and Chemistry. With its experienced investment team, HTGF supports startups in all phases of their development into international market leaders. HTGF invests in pre-seed and seed phases and can participate significantly in later-stage financing rounds. Since its inception in 2005, HTGF has financed more than 780 startups and achieved almost 200 successful exits. HTGF has a fund volume of over 2 billion euros.

Fund investors in the public-private partnership include the Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Energy, KfW Capital as well as 45 companies and family offices.

Our HQ Location is located in Bonn, Germany with additional offices in Berlin and Munich.

name: CRC Ventures
description: With crc ventures, they aim to help young companies overcome the hurdle of raising capital and accompany them on the first steps of company growth. They don't just invest capital; they also act as sparring partners. They understand the challenges that companies will face and offer support with their experience. They are looking for young companies and start-ups with drive and exciting business models.

name: 415 CAPITAL
description: 415 CAPITAL is a specialist venture capital firm that invests in early- and development-stage MedTech companies in Europe, the United States and Israel.They primarily invest in innovative medical device technologies addressing cardiovascular disease: the worldwide leading cause of death and the single largest cost driver in the global healthcaresystem.We are investors AND entrepreneurs: As investors, They have funded 45 MedTech companies in the past 28 years. As entrepreneurs, They have founded, built, and exited several successful European MedTech distribution companies.

description: Alpha Future Funds invests globally in companies fueling the low-carbon economy, EV revolution, and global battery transition. This commitment to sustainability means that their portfolio companies become market leaders in shaping a better future for humanity and future generations.

name: Zintinus

name: Döhler Ventures
description: Döhler Ventures is a long-term oriented & entrepreneurial investor empowering early-stage startups in the nutrition & technology ecosystem.q

name: BlackMars Capital

They enjoy partnering with teams who dare to build enduring businesses from scratch. They prefer early-stage partnerships, as they are familiar with what it’s like to navigate the primordial soup of a new venture on day zero.

description: Ananda Impact Ventures is an impact venture capital fund investing in sustainable solutions to the world’s most pressing ecological and social challenges. With €200M in assets under management (AUM) across four core impact funds, Ananda specialises in early-stage technology companies within the DACH region, the UK, Benelux, and the Nordics. Focus areas include biodiversity and climate solutions, healthcare, education, ageing populations, and biosecurity. Its active portfolio includes NatureMetrics (biodiversity monitoring solutions), Closed Loop Medicine (personalised medicine), OroraTech (space-based wildfire detection and monitoring) and IESO Digital Health (online psychotherapy).
investmentAreas: Climate, Biodiversity, Sustainability, Healthcare, TechBio, Wellbeing, Education, Impact

description: EKK & Co. is an early growth investor from Stuttgart with a successful track record spanning 20 years. They support their portfolio companies in leveraging their growth potential and guide them through all company phases up to a successful exit. They seek small, technology-oriented companies with a proven business model and very good growth prospects to complement their portfolio.

Startupbootcamp is a global network of industry-focused accelerators.

name: Atlantic Labs
description: Atlantic Labs is a European first-round investor, headquartered in Berlin. Since 2013, they have led over 150 first-round investments, backing category creators such as Soundcloud, GetYourGuide, Clue, Vimcar, Zenjob, Choco, and Wandelbots. description: Future Energy Ventures is a unique venture capital and collaboration platform that brings together corporate partners and world-class start-ups to shape the future energy landscape. Future Energy Ventures invests in digital and digitally enabled technologies and business models that have the potential to redefine the future energy landscape. From its operational hubs in Germany, Israel and Silicon Valley, Future Energy Ventures looks for both investments and scaling opportunities for its portfolio globally and new investment opportunities.

name: EnBW New Ventures
description: They support entrepreneurs to develop new solutions for a sustainable future—people, planet, and profit—by leveraging their financially driven VC setup with the reach and skills of their corporate investor, EnBW. The startups they invest in engage and scale with EnBW in its transformation towards becoming a sustainable and digital infrastructure operator.

name: Friedrich & Wagner
description: At F+W, they believe that technology has the power to change the world. They are a privately held investment company with a focus on innovative technology. They are dedicated to fostering forward-thinking technological ideas. Taking a hands-on approach, they encourage and support founders and help them bring transformative technologies to market.

name: Planet A Ventures
description: Planet A Ventures is a greentech venture fund looking to support European solutions for a sustainable future. Planet A Ventures has an in-house science team that calculates life cycle assessments to determine a startup's impact. Their scientists have the authority to veto investments if the impact is not significant and quantifiable. Planet AVentures invests in European green tech start-ups that are making a significant positive impact on the environment while also building scalable businesses.

name: FOSTEC Ventures
description: FOSTEC VENTURES is a private investment company providing equity financing for start-ups and SMEs in Germany. They always invest their own capital. The partners and the owner of FOSTEC VENTURES combine many years of experience as entrepreneurs and managing directors with skills in commercial, financial, and legal matters, focusing on the digital economy. They follow the approach of an entrepreneurially active investor. For them, investing capital is only the beginning of the long-term development of a company with the aim of creating a champion.

name: Statkraft Ventures
description: SK Ventures is a leading venture capital investor focused on the energy transition and climate tech. They partner with exceptional founders in early- and growth-stage start-ups in Europe and North America. With offices in Germany and Norway and backed by Statkraft, Europe's largest producer of renewable energy, SK Ventures provides capital and expertise to accelerate the transition to a more sustainable future.

name: World Fund
description: World Fund is a European Climate Tech VC fund investing in startups that contribute to solving the climate crisis. It focuses on the key emitting sectors Energy, Food & Agriculture, Manufacturing, Buildings, and Transport. World Fund aims to fill two significant investment gaps for climate tech: when tech goes from lab to market and when itleaves the pilot stage to scale. World Fund will invest from Seed to Series B stage.

name: FH Ventures
description: Together with partners from a diversified network, FH Ventures develops ventures, invests in start-ups and drives real estate projects. The focus lies on the intersection of disruptive business models, technology, and design.

name: Leblon Capital
description: They invest in mission-driven founders, not companies, focusing on the boldest, most ambitious, and most innovative projects aimed at building enduring and transformational businesses. While they prefer to invest in the first round with USD 150k to USD 300k at pre-seed/seed stages, they can write smaller checks if necessary and build larger positions exceeding USD 1 million in follow-on rounds. With a sector-agnostic approach, they prioritize founders who create deep-tech solutions to transform industries or create new sectors, committing their own money for the long run without time constraints.

name: Heal Capital

Backed by Germany's private health insurance sector, they provide financial support and strategic guidance to startups. Their focus includes digital health solutions that improve patient care and healthcare delivery efficiency.

name: GR Capital
description: GR Capital is a pan-European venture fund with a panoramic view. They combine a broad perspective, deep analysis, and clear focus to back fast-growing tech companies with proven teams, models, and scalability. Their focus spans across health, wealth, housing, and mobility. Their purpose is to power growth through capital and connections, enabling these companies to expand their market, talent pool, operations, and opportunities.

name: Incharge Capital Partners
description: Incharge invests early in technology companies that redefine how goods and people move by land, sea, and air. They combine mobility excellence and startup scaling expertise to provide unique value to mobility innovators.

name: Heliad Equity Partners
description: Heliad's mission is to empower both entrepreneurs and investors. They find, fund, and support market-leading companies across various verticals and regions to power their next phase of growth. As a listed company and through their strong team and strategic partners, they support companies pre, at, and post IPO and act as a gateway to public equity capital markets.
investmentAreas: FinTech, Internet, Life Science, Food & Beverage, Agnostic

name: Hyperion Invest
description: Hyperion Invest is a Berlin-based early-stage/seed/pre-seed investor for startups with the capability to change an industry. They offer financial support, access to their network, industry knowledge, and professional experience. They seek strong leadership personalities with unique business ideas who strive for success and focus on sustainability in practice and purpose.

name: Hessen Kapital
description: They invest in Hessian companies at the start-up and early stages, in technology-oriented start-ups and university spin-offs, in innovation and growth, and in company successions. In this way, they create offers of equity and equity-like funds as an alternative to traditional loan financing.

name: Orange Corp
description: Orange Corp is one among world's leading venture capital companies in LP (Limited Partner) category. We’re a cloud technology company that provides organizations around the world with computing infrastructure and software to help them innovate, unlock efficiencies and become more effective. Global VC company creating an impact through acceleration, incubation and funding of ventures for a sustainable future.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Fashion, Food Processing, Media, Entertainment

name: Barmenia Next Strategies
description: Barmenia Next Strategies (BNS) invests in digital business models for tomorrow's customer needs. Here, they act as a supporter of marketable models with their digital expertise from the insurance industry and the healthcare market.

name: Acton Capital
description: Acton Capital is a leading later-stage venture capital investor with presence in Munich and Vancouver. Since 1999, the Acton team backs startups in the fields of fintech, SaaS, consumer health, mobility & logistics, education or future of work on their way to market leadership. With over two decades of investment experience in tech-enabledbusiness models, the team has invested 700+M EUR in more than 199 companies across five fund generations. Acton Capital invests worldwide, with a strong focus on Europe and North America.
investmentAreas: Financial Services, FinTech, SaaS, Venture Capital

name: Moonwalk Ventures
description: Moonwalk Ventures is a Venture Capital firm focused on seed-stage startups. They speak the language of business founders, as all their shareholders are entrepreneurs themselves. Their main holdings include shares in Sponsoo, an innovative online marketplace for sport sponsorship.

name: Yabeo
description: They invest in tech startups that redefine outdated rules in their segments. Partnering with visionary founders, they actively support them throughout their journey. Together, they empower outstanding ideas that shape the world in a sustainable way.

name: NBank Capital
description: NBank Capital invests in young, innovative companies in the seed and startup phase, N investments in SMEs with capital requirements for growth. With their investment capital in the form of silent or open investments, they support Lower Saxony startups as well as small and medium-sized companies without a specific industry or topic focus. Whether it is in the founding phase, growth, or company succession, they provide the necessary support.

name: TVM Capital Life Science
description: TVM Capital Life Science is a dedicated life science venture capital firm, with offices in Montreal, Canada and Munich, Germany. Since inception, TVM Capital Life Science has invested in entrepreneurial venture backed companies. Over several fund generations, their investment strategy has included a multi-stage investment approach spanningdiscovery to market ready companies as well as profitable companies searching for growth capital. Their investment focus has always been broad and includes investments in therapeutics, technology platforms, medtech and diagnostics.

name: Senovo
description: Senovo is an early-stage VC firm focusing on B2B SaaS investments, particularly in process optimization, Industry 4.0, and data-enabled solutions. They invest in European software companies with a minimum of €30k MRR and support them in building scalable sales models, creating performance-driven HR approaches, and expanding internationally. Their initial investments range from €1-5 million, with an emphasis on companies enabling digital transformation for medium and large enterprises.

name: Nenio Ventures
description: Nenio is the Venture Capital branch of the Family Office Otten and provides early stage financing ((pre-) Seed and Series A) for exceptional teams with innovative products / services to build sustainable business models.

name: Egora Holding
description: EGORA Ventures AG leads an industrial group headquartered in Martinsried near Munich. They are active entrepreneurs; simply financing and passively waiting for results is not how they see themselves. For those seeking active partners, they can be the right financier for new ventures. They concentrate on a narrow investment focus in broadband communication, industrial optronics, software and web services, SaaS-enabled marketplaces, and life science platform technologies.

name: Digital Health Ventures
description: Digital Health Ventures (DHV) is a sector-focused Venture Capital Fund based in Berlin. They are experienced early-stage investors with a track record that includes several strong European healthcare innovators. Their mission is to build a sustainable Digital Health ecosystem. They actively support portfolio entrepreneurs and leverage their networks in tech and healthcare. They work together closely and find joint solutions. They invest in startups which will play a significant role in healthcare and that want a strong partner during this journey.

name: seed + speed Ventures
description: Seed + Speed Ventures is an early-stage VC firm focusing on pre-seed and seed investments in B2B software startups in Germany, Switzerland, and Austria. They provide up to EUR 1 million initially, with the potential to invest up to EUR 3 million per startup. Their unique approach combines financial investment with extensive sales and marketing support to help startups scale effectively.
investmentAreas: Enterprise Software, FinTech, Software, Virtual Reality

name: Oscar & Paul
description: At O&P Beiersdorf Venture Capital, they aim to shape the future of skin care by creating new and better ways to make people feel good in their skin. They believe that collaboration is the way to reach that goal, so they work hand in hand with startups and corporations along the whole value chain, across industries and disciplines. By supporting entrepreneurship and sharing their assets and expertise, they enable others with innovative business models or disruptive technologies to make an impact.

name: SpinLab – The HHL Accelerator
description: SpinLab - The HHL Accelerator ranks among the best European accelerators. The hybrid 6 month program focusses on energy, smart city & health. SpinLab – The HHL Accelerator supports entrepreneurial teams in growing and establishing innovative businesses. Our mission is to foster entrepreneurship and innovation in the heart of Germany and beyond by offering hands-on guidance to startups and spin-offs.
investmentAreas: Coworking Space, Accelerator Program, Venture Clienting, Corporate Innovation, Healthtech

name: TGFS – Technologiegründerfonds Sachsen
description: The TGFS is an equity investor for knowledge-based, technology-oriented start-ups in Saxony. It is the leading start-up financier in the Free State and supports teams with venture capital and management support in both the seed and start-up phases. A stake in the TGFS gives portfolio companies access to other international investors.

name: Open Data Incubator for Europe (ODINE)
description: ODINE provides an accelerator programme for SMEs and startups to establish business in open data related areas. The Open Data Incubator for Europe (ODINE) is a 6-month incubator for open data entrepreneurs across Europe. The programme is funded with a €7.8m grant from the EU’s Horizon 2020 programme and is delivered by the seven partners featured below.
investmentAreas: Finance, Financial Services, Incubators, Lending, Investments

name: Revent
description: They gather a community of purpose-led founders, investors, and scientists to drive systemic change in climate, healthcare, education, and finance. Their role is to provide founders the platform to succeed, supporting them with capital, relevant networks, and an aligned mission. They believe that in today’s world, the companies founded by extraordinary teams around a strong purpose will be the ones to succeed and thrive.

name: Redstone
description: Redstone is a European venture capital firm following selected investment strategies. Their focused approach with specialized investment teams for each strategy has enabled them to develop strong sector expertise and networks. This combination supercharges their portfolio companies. They’ve spent a decade building the world’s leading proprietary startup analytics and data platform, SOFIA, allowing them to make evidence-based and data-driven investment decisions.

name: Nixdorf Kapital
description: As one of the few financial service providers in Germany, they have an exclusive investment approach in the realm of ESG. They have been involved in sustainable investment projects for decades, and their experts are able to identify real substance. This is how they create a genuine return: for investors, as well as for society and the environment.

name: OHA Osnabrück Healthcare Accelerator
description: OHA Osnabrück Healthcare Accelerator support startups from the entire healthcare sector. At OHA we support startups from the healthcare industry and life sciences. We are convinced that a future-proof healthcare system must be more digital, collaborative and diverse.
investmentAreas: Innovation Management, Startup Promotion, Digital Health, Healthcare, Life Science

name: BITKRAFT Esports Ventures
description: They are built on a love of gaming fueled by an entrepreneurial spirit with the explicit purpose of empowering extraordinary founders to actualize the ideas that won't leave them alone. Their perspective on the future of the industries in which they invest—gaming, Web3, and immersive technology—is anchored around a thesis of Synthetic Reality: the convergence of physical and digital worlds will continuously introduce new human experiences and create unprecedented social and economic opportunities.

name: Deutsche Bahn Digital Ventures
description: Deutsche Bahn Digital Ventures (DBDV) is the corporate venture arm of Deutsche Bahn Group, Germany’s largest railway company and leading mobility provider. With funds of €100 million, DBDV intends to invest in startups with data-driven business models in the areas of Mobility, Logistics, Smart City, Internet of Things, Artificial Intelligence andBig Data. All within and beyond Deutsche Bahn’s core rail businesses. Investments will be sourced on a global basis, with emphasis on Europe, the United States and Israel. Funding is provided for startups from the Seed to Series C stage, with significant possibilities for follow-up funding. Alongside external investments, DBDV also is focused on promoting intrapreneurship inside the Deutsche Bahn Group and is working closely together with the group’s existing startup engagement platform Beyond1435 to leverage the acceleration of financed startups.

name: Realum.Cloud
description: They seek out and develop innovative, promising, and scalable business ideas in order to advance them in the start-up phase with capital and know-how.

name: DTC Ventures
description: They invest in exceptional teams and scale direct-to-consumer business models that have the potential to disrupt industries. For those seeking early-stage investment from strategic business angels who can support them in scaling their business or looking for consulting on operations, they encourage getting in touch.

name: Partners in Clime
description: As a collective of entrepreneurs, they back green tech founders by providing capital and mentoring, offering fair terms that enable them to make choices in favor of their vision.

name: DvH Ventures
description: Dieter von Holtzbrinck Ventures (DvH Ventures) is one of Europe's leading early stage investors. As an entrepreneurial venture capitalist, DvH Ventures invests in emerging technology companies and builds successful investment clusters in areas such as Digital Health, Education, DeepTech or Climate Tech/ESG.
investmentAreas: Education, FinTech, Health Care, Venture Capital

name: XPRESS Ventures
description: XPRESS Ventures is a Berlin-based company builder focused on technology-driven ideas in the logistics industry. As a proud partner of FIEGE Logistics, XPRESS Ventures offers founders to be their cutting-edge partner and turn their ideas into disruptive innovations and scalable companies. XPRESS Ventures aims to combine the best of two worlds - theknowhow, infrastructure and client network of a gobal logistics service provider with a vibrant startup-ecosystem of investors, advisors and talents.

name: SpielFabrique
description: SpielFabrique SpielFabrique is an accelerator program for start-ups and young entrepreneurs in the games market. This program puts the focus on a comprehensive mentoring offer and an excellent network of companies, gaming experts, financiers and renowned program partners, such as Microsoft and ARTE France. Together we ensure that game developers can reach their goals more professionally, faster and more efficiently.
investmentAreas: Game development, Mentoring, Start-Up Accelerator, Game Incubator, Financing

name: Yttrium
description: Yttrium is a growth equity investment firm specializing in B2B technology companies, partnering with management teams to scale their businesses globally. With over €750 million in assets under management, they focus on providing targeted, high-impact support for growth-stage investments. Yttrium operates from offices in Frankfurt, London, and Munich, backing companies to become global leaders in their sectors.
investmentAreas: Enterprise Software, FinTech, Industrial Automation, Information Technology

name: BlueYard Capital
description: BlueYard invests in founders with transforming ideas that decentralize markets and empower humanity. Typically $1-3m as an initial investment; active around the world. Most active in crypto / web 3 (e.g. Protocol Labs, Filecoin, Open Zeppelin, Radicle), technologies that help us overcome our largest planetary challenges (e.g. Marvel Fusion,Meatable, Dance), frontier biology to help us live long and prosper (e.g. BitBio, Biofidelity) and vertical software un-bundling monopolies (e.g. Pitch, Wonder).

name: Moonrock Capital
description: Moonrock Capital is a crypto-native advisory and investment firm focused on incubating and accelerating early-stage startups in the Web3 space. They aim to drive transformation by supporting projects related to infrastructure, middleware, DeFi, and dApps, aligning with their vision of a decentralized digital future. Founded in 2019, they prioritize long-term relationships based on trust, open-mindedness, and transparency.

name: Scytale Ventures
description: Scytale Ventures is a team of investment management experts, blockchain technology experts, and entrepreneurs. The company's blockchain provides a solution based on the principle of trustlessness, which implies people don't have to rely on third parties, individuals, or organizations.

name: Wellington Partners
description: Wellington Partners is a venture capital firm that invests in technology and life sciences companies, focusing on Digital Media, Software, Electronics & Photonics, Resource Efficiency, and Biotech/Life Sciences. They are committed to providing outstanding entrepreneurs with the necessary resources to fund their strategies. They typically lead financing rounds ranging from € 0.5 million to € 20 million. Depending on the maturity of the company, their own commitment can go as high as € 15 million.

name: Blockchain Founders Capital
description: Blockchain Founders Capital is a venture capital firm investing in early-stage companies developing cutting-edge solutions using blockchain technology, they share ideas, learn from, and co-invest with the leading minds in the blockchain and venture capital community.

name: Innoport
description: Innoport is the venture capital arm of the Schulte Group, inheriting the technology innovation, the global mindset and the Hanseatic handshake that distinguish their parent company Bernhard Schulte – a maritime innovator and operator since its own beginnings in 1883. They invest in startups globally, focusing at seed stage ventures across Europe and Asia.
investmentAreas: Logistics, Marine Technology, Marine Transportation, Shipping

name: PT1
description: PT1 is a fully independent venture capital firm that focuses on pre-seed & seed investments in transformative real asset technologies. Real assets (real estate, infrastructure and energy) are undergoing a profound transformation caused by the increasing scarcity of natural resources, carbon budgets, square metres and skilled labour. PT1 invests in #Futurebuilders, startups benefitting from these megatrends by serving the high economic, social and political demand through scalable solutions.

name: Picus Capital
description: Picus Capital is an early-stage technology investment firm with a long-term investment philosophy. They collaborate with daring technology companies to build successful, global enterprises that challenge the status quo and shape tomorrow. They aim to become the closest partner of their portfolio companies by working together on key strategic decisions and operative challenges.
investmentAreas: E-Commerce, Fin-Tech, Med-tech, HR-Tech, Logistics, Web3

name: Realyze Ventures
description: As a venture capital investor with a focus on technology companies in the construction and real estate industry, they invest in the brightest European founders who are building visionary solutions for the biggest challenges in the industry – aiming to achieve an innovative and CO2-friendly future.

name: BitStone Capital
description: BitStone Capital is an internationally operating company builder and investor who selectively invests in innovative digital Real Estate and Construction business models, and also accelerates their growth with own resources. BitStone supports young companies with its outstanding network, excellent industry know-how and broad expertise in newtechnologies - from product development through market entry to successful rollout.

name: Vorwerk Ventures
description: Their unique experience, in addition to an outstanding track record, provides added value for forward-thinking tech entrepreneurs. Headquartered in Berlin, Germany, they are constantly on the lookout for promising opportunities, starting with Seed/Series A investments of €1m to €5m and ensuring continuous support by reserving up to €15m for upcoming financing rounds. An outstanding founding team, a unique product or service addressing a substantial market, and a strong business model are key requirements for them when making an investment decision.
investmentAreas: Consumer, Green-Tech, Clean-Tech, Food & Beverage, Food-Tech

name: Holtzbrinck Digital
description: Their investment focus is on digital businesses in the fields of Science, Education and Content which is grounded in deep market understanding and strong domain expertise. With offices in Munich, London and Boston they follow a global approach and back convincing business models with their experience, network and background aiming for the nextlevel of growth. Partnering with the founders and management teams of their companies is key for them. They regularly work closely together and support with strategic and operational advice. The joint goal is to ensure operational success and to create economic value. ​

name: RV Invest
description: RVI is a VC fund of the Vetter Pharma family office. Their mission is to support innovations that improve patients' lives. They engage early and stand alongside founders and researchers to bring outstanding ideas to the market. They invest in highly differentiated technical solutions that can become future standards of care.

name: Blockwall
description: Blockwall Management provides investors with the unique opportunity to participate in the emergence of decentralized technologies as well as their applications and services.

name: Signature Ventures
description: Signature Ventures is an early-stage Venture Capital fund investing in Blockchain, Distributed Ledger Technology and Web3 technology. The fund backs exceptional founders that build the backbone of the next-generation internet: open, secure, and privacy-centered. Founded in 2019, Signature is based in Germany and invests in Pre-Seed to Series Astartups globally with a focus on Europe.

name: Amino Collective
description: Amino Collective’s primary investment focus lies within the realms of health and bio. They help bring life-changing ideas to life by backing, connecting, and advancing their collective of entrepreneurs and scientists. They invest in early-stage ventures that have a European focus and the ambition to scale globally.

name: Apollo Health Ventures
description: Apollo Health Ventures is a transatlantic early-stage venture capital firm focused on investing in transformative healthcare companies targeting age-related diseases and aging itself. They leverage a combination of traditional funding and venture building to create value in Europe and the US, partnering with scientific experts and top institutions. Their approach aims to enable breakthroughs in biotechnology to enhance healthy lifespans and reduce healthcare costs.

name: Nucleus Capital
description: Nucleus Capital is a Climate Deep-Tech VC that invests in early-stage ventures focusing on programmable biology, food technology, and green industrials. They partner with purpose-driven entrepreneurs to address systemic challenges to planetary health, providing funding and sector-specific expertise. Their investments range from €150k to €1 million, targeting startups in Europe and the US.

name: w3.fund
description: Since 2022, w3.group has been a cornerstone of the Web3 community, providing a comprehensive ecosystem that includes investment funds, co-working and event spaces, token infrastructure, and media services. Located in Berlin, their goal is to drive digital innovation and support the growth of Web3, ensuring that the benefits of this technology are accessible to all.

name: Blockarm Capital
description: Blockarm provides semi-institutional investors with exposure to game-changing protocols of the future. With their industry know-how and tools, they enable their investors to expand their portfolios and tap into this massively growing asset class with conviction.

name: Delivery Hero Ventures
description: Delivery Hero Ventures' mission is to support the next generation of founder-led technology companies that are disrupting some of the most fast-moving industries around the world.
investmentAreas: B2B, FinTech, Food Delivery, GreenTech, Internet of Things, Robotics

name: SCALEHOUSE Capital
description: SCALEHOUSE Capital is an early-stage venture capital fund in Germany. Their partner and investor background enables them to support startups in a unique way. SCALEHOUSE Capital, as a venture capital fund, unites owners and founders of leading medium-sized enterprises and hidden champions, as well as the public sector. With these special accesses, they support the next generation of leading, capital-efficient software startups in their category.

name: LEA Partners
description: LEA Partners is a venture capital firm based in Karlsruhe, Germany, specializing in early-stage and buy-out investments in B2B tech companies. With a proven track record since 2003, they focus on supporting innovative technology businesses located in Europe's leading deep tech hub. Their expertise and extensive network help foster growth and success for their portfolio companies.
investmentAreas: B2B, Supply Chain Management, Logistics, SaaS

name: Astutia Ventures
description: ASTUTIA Ventures invests since 2006 in innovative start-ups with outstanding growth potential. Their investment focus is in the areas of smart cities, future of commerce and digital lifestyle. To entrepreneurs and companies in their early growth stages, they offer venture capital, a truly international business network and specialized know-how inorder to support successful development and sustainable growth.

name: Visionaries Tomorrow
description: TOMORROW is an early-stage climate deep tech fund backing the next generation of era-defining companies rebuilding the world’s largest industries for a brighter tomorrow. They supercharge their portfolio founders by leveraging the deep industrial access and high-growth scaling expertise of their Visionaries Club LPs, some of the world’s most influential industrial giants and unicorn founders.

name: b.value AG
description: b.value AG invests in talented and courageous entrepreneurs who want to build the companies of the future with highly scalable business models and disruptive, proprietary biotechnology, and material technology-based innovations. Their unique fund structure and operative experience allow them to act flexibly and for the long term.

name: Peppermint Venture Partners
description: PVP is a private venture capital firm based in Berlin, investing in early-stage healthcare companies across Europe with a focus on medical device, digital health, and platform technology companies. Peppermint VenturePartners was established in 2008 by Ingeborg Neumann, Dr. Joachim Rautter and Dr. Klaus Stöckemann.

name: Hauer Ventures
description: Hauer Ventures focuses on investing in European deep tech founders to bring their ideas to reality. Hauer Ventures aims to bring new technology to the market, create talented and diverse teams, as well as connect the ecosystem.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cyber Security, Information Technology, Quantum Computing, Robotics

description: āltitude is a (pre-) seed venture capital firm that is closing the European SME Tech Gap by investing in B2B/software-first startups with a focus on people, product, and process - predominantly targeting DACH and the UK. Through their strategic positioning, portfolio construction, and deal-sourcing programs (Open Angel, Trojan, and Maven), their fund has three edges that differentiate them from other European VC firms - they are creating better access, earlier.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Information Technology, SaaS, Clean-Tech

name: SquareOne Venture Capital
description: SquareOne is a venture capital firm focused on pre-seed and seed investments in B2B technology. Typically the first institutional investor on the cap table, SquareOne provides a unique first-customers-guarantee to all its portfolio companies, acting as an entrepreneurial sparring partner and hands-on supporter from day one. With its network ofleading executives, tech entrepreneurs, and investors, SquareOne builds the foundation for large and profitable category leaders in B2B software and deep tech businesses across Europe and counts companies like Stripe, Pipedrive, Carbon One, and Wandelbots as part of its portfolio. The Berlin-based VC, formerly known as Paua Ventures, was founded in 2010.

name: Next Big Thing
description: Next Big Thing AG (NBT) is the leading venture studio and technology provider for accelerating digital transformation and the world’s transition toward the Machine Economy. With its diverse portfolio of deep-tech ventures, NBT provides long-term support for aspiring founders to build highly scalable, tech-enabled businesses that deliver real-world impact.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain, Hardware, Internet of Things, SaaS

name: MobilityFund
description: MobilityFund is a global partnership of founders & funders with deep experience transforming the mobility sectors. They work with startups and incumbents disrupting the connectivity, autonomy, shared mobility, energy and logistics sectors, across Europe, the Americas, and Asia. Their 20 plus partners help accelerate, invest, and acquire across the disruptive mobility landscape.
investmentAreas: Automotive, Autonomous Vehicles, Electric Vehicle, Internet of Things, Sharing Economy, Transportation

name: Capnamic Ventures
description: Capnamic is a venture capital firm from Berlin/Cologne doing early-stage investments in outstanding teams in Germany/Austria/Switzerland. The team’s expertise includes 70+ investments, 30+ successful trade sales and 13+ IPOs as well as broad professional experience across various industries and functions. Capnamic unitesinstitutional and corporate investors thus offering its portfolio companies a unique network of sparring partners and customers.
investmentAreas: B2B SaaS, HR-Tech, Insur-Tech, Prop-Tech, Artificial Intelligence

name: Accelerator Frankfurt
description: Accelerator Frankfurt is an independent go-to-market program focused on Fintech, Cybersecurity and Digital B2B startups. The entrepreneurs are scouted mainly from Germany, Israel and the Nordics. They bring added value not only to the startups but also to corporations by matching the startup solutions to corporate needs.

name: Earlybird Venture Capital
description: Earlybird invests in all development and growth phases of technology companies. Among the most experienced venture investors in Europe, Earlybird offers its portfolio companies not only financial resources but also strategic support plus access to an international network and capital markets. With EUR 2 billion under management,eight IPOs and 30 trade sales, Earlybird is one of the most established and active venture capital firms in Europe.
investmentAreas: Agnostic, Med-Tech, Deep-Tech, Artificial Intelligence, Mobility, Robotics, Bio-Tech

name: Sharkbite Innovation
description: Sharkbite Innovation is a consultancy and ecosystem builder that delivers business models with an impact in the organization. The Sharks are supporting organizations at the intersection of technology, innovation and sustainability. The goal is to master the challenge of transformation to sustainable growth.
investmentAreas: Consulting, Innovation Management, Management Consulting, Sustainability

name: Spotlight! Ventures
description: Spotlight! Ventures is an investment platform for technology and digital companies. They invest in courageous founders and teams with passion, ambition, willingness to take risks, determination, and innovative ideas. They give your company a stage and accompany you on your journey: from Zero to Hero!

name: Foundamental
description: Foundamental is the largest global investor in ConstructionTech and architecture, engineering and design technology. Foundamental backs ambitious founders across the Americas, Asia-Pacific and Europe from inception to IPO.

name: AI.FUND
description: AI.FUND invests in the most promising early stage AI first startups in Europe and Israel which put AI at the heart of their impactful solution. AI.FUND focus' on the application of AI across all sectors. AI.FUND's preferred stages are seed and Series A rounds. AI.FUND expects first customer traction and the ambition to scaleinternationally.

name: Magmatic Ventures
description: Magmatic Ventures is a Venture Capital Boutique investing in disruptive, digital start-ups. They support start-ups financially with investments and by finding co-investors. In addition, they assist in operations, strategy, and talent recruitment. In areas where they don't have the expertise directly in their team, they leverage a great network. They prefer to invest in local start-ups but also invest in truly fantastic start-ups globally. Based in Düsseldorf, Germany, they also have an interim office in Munich.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Augmented Reality, Big Data, Cyber Security, E-Commerce, E-Learning, FinTech, GovTech, Marketplace, SaaS, Virtual Reality

name: Curious Capital
description: Curious Capital is the corporate venture subsidiary of Heinen-Verlag, and was just established in 2017. Heinen-Verlag, founded in 1946, is a Cologne-based publishing house with activities and history in regional print media. Curious Capital is now looking for seed and early stage investments in business models, products and/or markets, whichanyhow fit to activities of a modern media company.

name: Lunar Ventures
description: Lunar Ventures is a Berlin-based venture capital firm specializing in deep tech investments across Europe. Lunar Ventures provides both financial backing and strategic guidance to help their portfolio companies succeed in highly technical and complex industries.
investmentAreas: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Cloud Computing, Computer Vision, Cyber Security, Information and Communications Technology (ICT), Machine Learning

name: Cherry Ventures
description: Cherry Ventures is an early-stage venture capital firm led by a team of entrepreneurs with experience building fast-scaling companies such as Zalando and Spotify. The firm backs Europe's boldest founders, usually as their first institutional investor, and supports them in everything from their go-to-market strategy and the scaling of theirbusinesses.
